name: dm-helper
description: Currently an encounter tracker to help a TTRPG DM keep track of initiative order, character stats, and statuses.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.installall: concurrently "npm i" "cd client && npm i" "cd server && npm i"
scripts.seed: cd server && npm run seed && cd ..

author: TJ James
